iox.GoogleSheet¶

class iox.GoogleSheet(spreadsheet_id, credentials=None)[source]¶

Read and write to Google sheets.

Methods:

__init__(spreadsheet_id, credentials=None)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

delete_sheet(sheet)[source]¶

Delete sheet by name from Google spreadsheet.

Parameters

sheet (str) – Name of Google sheet.

delete_sheet_id(sheet_id)[source]¶

Delete sheet by ID from Google spreadsheet.

Parameters

sheet_id (int) – ID of Google sheet, i.e., https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/[spreadsheet_id]/edit#gid=[sheet_id]
